mapper.sql:
ORDER BY
REGDATE DESC, HITS DESC, SEQ,
BANNER DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BANNER (STATE, TITLE, IMAGE, TYPE, LOCATION, SEQ, LINK, START, END) VALUE (#{state}, #{title}, #{image}, #{type}, #{location}, #{seq}, #{link}, #{start}, #{end});
mapper.update: UPDATE BANNER SET HITS = HITS + 1 WHERE BANNER = #{banner}
INSERT BANNER_MEMBER (BANNER, MEMBER) VALUE (#{banner}, #{member}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE UPDDATE = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER IN (SELECT MEMBER FROM BANNER_MEMBER WHERE BANNER = #{banner})
